summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 127, A.A. Denny's Broadway Addition, being the alley between Summit Avenue and Boylston Avenue, from Seneca Street to University Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 113018 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
